list.abs: object : investigate the preparing methods of Pedo Antiperspirant , and observe its curative effect on childrens diaphoresis symptom .目的：研究制定小儿止汗合剂制备工艺及方法，并观察其临床治疗小儿汗证的近期疗效。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: via late Latin from Greek, from diaphorein 'carry off, sweat out', from dia 'through' + phorein 'carry'

means.word_mean: 1. the process of the sweat glands of the skin secreting a salty fluid;
